thread.title_full: Trump's frenetic presidency fueled by steaks and Diet Coke | Daily Mail Online

author: Geoff Earle
title: Trump's frenetic presidency fueled by steaks and Diet Coke | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Trump's frenetic presidency is fueled by steaks and Diet Coke, after KFC and McDonald's powered his campaign â€“ and his only exercise comes on the golf course (where he takes a cart) President Donald Trump is tempering his fast food-filled diet now that he is living in the White House He favors a meat-heavy regimen filled with steaks and burgers The president, 70, eschews exercise but has said his campaign rallies are a workout Favors Lay's potato chips Tweeted photo of himself preparing to dig into a bucket of KFC during the campaign Doesn't drink or smoke
